description: ● Partnered with cross-functional development teams to design and deploy modern, responsive web applications, driving a 25% increase in user engagement.Integrated third-party APIs, boosting user engagement by 25% and reducing response time by 15%. Spearheaded the development of multiple full-stack web applications.

● Created full-stack web applications for small and businesses, incorporating modern tools such as React.js and PostgreSQL, resulting in a 40% improvement in client satisfaction. Consulted clients on SEO best practices and social media strategies, leading to a 50% increase in website traffic.
